extendedInfo.description: EFS Mobile Manager Source is the source that allows our customers cutting-edge, convenient access to their EFS card and fleet management functions while on the go. This app allows our customers to manage their cards and their fleet anytime and anywhere from their mobile device. From managing driversâ access to card funds, to issuing cash advances or Money Codes, to performing location overrides, to getting detailed on-the-go reports, this innovative, secure mobile app provides unprecedented EFS card management and control.While the app is free for the public to download, users must be a current EFS customer with a valid and active E-Manager userID and password in order to use this app.

reviews.title: SLOW - LACKING OPTIONS I NEED!
reviews.comment: No option to not include the transaction fee in money codes. I always have to add $1.75 to each check before I issue it. It\'s SUPER SLOW! Sometimes it\'s super fast but never when I need it to be. Fix the money code fee and better rating from me. Once a money code is issued, there\'s no way to text it to a driver or send it via email. I have to get my pen and paper out anyway! Useful while on the go but time consuming....better to just call the number and follow the prompts since  Ineed a pen and paper regardless.
reviews.author: Laura Miceli

reviews.title: Loads slow, really slow
reviews.comment: Card lookup needs improvement. It\'s easier to search by X-REF rather then last five digits of the card.
reviews.author: Andrew Tsurkan
